Method Detail

createThread

public void createThread()
Creates a new thread, with an empty Handler. If a Handler is required, then one can use the GameThread.setHandler() method. However, you will be also be required to extend the GameThread class, to make use of the Handler.

createGameOverHandler

public void createGameOverHandler(Activity activity)
Creates a basic gameover Handler. When the thread is set to a state of LOSE, then this message will be displayed.
